## DataSHARE calls

- 2 FRB-CESAB calls in 2022 & 2023 
- 6 projects funded and supported

<br>

. . .

> **Objective:** Accelerating the sharing of open-access and large scale _novel_ biodiversity related datasets.

<br>

. . .

- Publication of metadata and database
- Release of code and workflow used to preprocess, clean and homogenize the data from raw to final stage

<br>

. . .

{{< fa circle-right >}} &nbsp; A **new call** is scheduled for 2025
